meanings.definition: Express warm approval or admiration for someone's achievements.
meanings.sent1: She congratulates her friend on winning the race.
meanings.sent2: He always congratulates his teammates after a game.
meanings.sent3: The cat congratulates the dog on catching the ball.
meanings.sent4: The sun congratulates the flowers by shining brightly on them.
meanings.sent5: The teacher congratulates the students with a big smile and a high-five.

meanings.definition: Offer good wishes to someone on a happy occasion.
meanings.sent1: They congratulates their neighbor on their new baby.
meanings.sent2: We will congratulate our friend on their birthday.
meanings.sent3: The tree congratulates the squirrel on finding a big acorn.
meanings.sent4: The stars congratulate the moon on lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The whole town congratulates the mayor on a successful event.
